# Reference

<!-- DO NOT EDIT: This document was generated by Puppet Strings -->

## Table of Contents

### Classes

* [`self_service`](#self_service): This class should be enabled if you wish Puppet to notify when self_service indicators are not at optimal values

## Classes

### <a name="self_service"></a>`self_service`

When this class is enabled, when any of the indicators in the self_service fact are false puppet will notify of this, individual tests can be disabled by removing them from the self_service_indicators parameter

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include self_service
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `self_service` class:

* [`exclude_self_service_indicators`](#exclude_self_service_indicators)

##### <a name="exclude_self_service_indicators"></a>`exclude_self_service_indicators`

Data type: `Array[String]`

List of disabled indicators, place any indicator ids you do not wish to report on in this list

Default value: `[]`
